about.description: Founded in 2004 by Mr. Birendra Singh Yadav and Mrs. Suresh Devi Yadav, Shree Krishna Public School began with a vision to provide quality education where values come before money. Over 20 years, it has transformed into a legacy of excellence, nurturing students who excel in both academics and life.
highlights: Gold in Games for 4 consecutive years
